title: Tether Introduces Scudo, Redefining Fractional Gold Ownership Onchain
content: 6 January 2026: Tether today announced the introduction of Scudo, a new unit of account for Tether Gold (XAU₮), designed to bring back gold as a means of payment, accessible to everyone, as global gold interest and prices reach their highest levels on record. Gold has surged to historic highs in 2025, driven by persistent […]

title: Tether Releases QVAC Genesis II, Expanding the World’s Largest Synthetic Educational Dataset to 148 Billion Tokens
content: Tether Data’s AI research division, QVAC, today announced the release of QVAC Genesis II, a major expansion of the world’s largest publicly available synthetic educational dataset for artificial intelligence pre-training. With the addition of 107 billion new tokens, the combined QVAC Genesis dataset now totals 148 billion tokens across 19 educational […]
